name: ManageEntity
description:
Create, update, or delete entities and manage relationships.

Use this tool to manage people or objects, including associating them with other entities. Useful for handling companies, courses, products, and more.

parameters.name: entity_data
parameters.description: A JSON object containing details about the person or object. Use this to create, update, or delete the entity and manage relationships.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the Customer.io Track API
